<style>
/* Timeline container */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  padding: 40px 20px;
}

/* Vertical line */
.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 30px;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 4px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #6b7280 0%, #9ca3af 100%);
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* Timeline item */
.timeline-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  padding-left: 80px;
}

/* Timeline marker (dot) */
.timeline-marker {
  position: absolute;
  left: 18px;
  top: 10px;
  width: 26px;
  height: 26px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #6b7280;
  border: 5px solid #ffffff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #6b7280, 0 4px 12px rgba(107, 114, 128, 0.35);
  z-index: 2;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

.timeline-item:hover .timeline-marker {
  transform: scale(1.4);
  background: #9ca3af;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #9ca3af, 0 6px 20px rgba(156, 163, 175, 0.5);
}

/* Timeline content box */
.timeline-content {
  background: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 28px 32px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
  border-left: 5px solid #6b7280;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

.timeline-item:hover .timeline-content {
  box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(107, 114, 128, 0.18), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(107, 114, 128, 0.12);
  transform: translateX(8px);
  border-left-color: #9ca3af;
}

/* Timeline header */
.timeline-header h3 {

  font-size: 1.5rem;

  line-height: 1.3;
}

.timeline-header .company {

}

.timeline-header .period {

}

/* Timeline details list */
.timeline-details {
  margin: 20px 0 0 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.timeline-details li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  color: #334155;
  line-height: 1.7;
  font-size: 0.98rem;
}

.timeline-details li::before {
  content: '→';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  color: #6b7280;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Responsive design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .timeline {
    padding: 20px 10px;
  }

    left: 15px;
